Name: Royale Storm Bowling
About the game: Time your flicks and target carefully, escape royale storm and become the bowling master to save the world! ◉ Unlock - Collect 80+ bowling balls. - Upgrade your ball combining 20 shadows and 20 colors. - Play on 32 beautiful levels. ◉ RPG - Level Up and upgrade your health and mana. - 50+ military ranks. ◉ Skills - Bullet&Time, Rewind&Stop, Speed limit 100 and Zoom! Make insane bowling stunts!
